trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery.Where"></xref> clause and a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery.Select"></xref> clause that identify the unique characteristics of a message so that it can be routed to the correct instance.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery> is a set of queries that are run on an incoming or outgoing message to generate a set of instance keys.
An <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey> represents an association between the data selected from the query and a particular service instance.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery.Where%2A> clause allows the user to filter the set of messages that this <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery> runs on.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery.Select%2A> clause represents the query set used to uniquely identify the service instance for which an incoming message should be dispatched.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery.SelectAdditional%2A> clauses are a set of query sets that represent new instance keys that must be created to associate that data with the service instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery"></xref> class.
Determines whether the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery"></xref> is equal to the specified object.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery> instances are considered equal if their <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery.Where%2A> clauses are equal.
The object to compare.
`true` if the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery"></xref> is equal to the specified object; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the hash code for the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery"></xref>.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery.GetHashCode%2A> returns a hash code based on the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery.Where%2A> clause.
The hash code for the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationQuery"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageQuerySet"></xref> that contains the elements in the message that compose the instance key that uniquely identifies the message.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageQuerySet"></xref> that contains the elements in the message that compose the instance key that uniquely identifies the message.
Gets a collection of clauses, each of which defines the set of elements in the message that make up an associated key.
A collection of clauses, each of which defines the set of elements in the message that make up an associated key.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref> that defines the set of messages for which this query applies.
The message filter that defines the set of messages for which this query applies.
